languages.text: {n}Исследования Горнила определили его назначение как устройство для преобразования поверхности миров. Работая на геотермальной энергии планеты, оно могло превратить пустошь в цветущий сад. Однако способ его запуска еще предстоит найти.{/n}

{n}Research into the Crucible has identified it as a device for surface terraforming. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it has yet to be found.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Исследования Горнила определили его назначение как устройство для преобразования поверхности миров. Работая на геотермальной энергии планеты, оно могло превратить пустошь в цветущий сад. Однако способ его запуска еще предстоит найти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The research of the Crucible had identified its purpose as a device for planet surface conversion. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it is yet to be found.{/n}

{n}The research of the Crucible had identified its purpose as a device for planet surface conversion. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it is yet to be found.{/n}

{n}Research into the Crucible has identified it as a device for surface terraforming. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it has yet to be found.{/n}

{n}Research into the Crucible has identified it as a device for surface terraforming. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it has yet to be found.{/n}

{n}Research into the Crucible has identified it as a device for surface terraforming. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it has yet to be found.{/n}

languages.text: {n}技术人员对熔炉进行了研究，确定它是某种地表改造装置。它可以利用行星的地热能，将荒地改造为盛开的花园。然而，目前还没有找到激活熔炉的方法。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Research into the Crucible has identified it as a device for surface terraforming. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it has yet to be found.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技术人员对熔炉进行了研究，确定它是某种地表改造装置。它可以利用行星的地热能，将荒地改造为盛开的花园。然而，目前还没有找到激活熔炉的方法。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La investigación sobre el Crisol lo ha identificado como un dispositivo para la terraformación de la superficie. Alimentado por la energía geotérmica del planeta, podría convertir un páramo en un floreciente jardín. Sin embargo, aún no se ha encontrado la forma de lanzarlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Research into the Crucible has identified it as a device for surface terraforming. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it has yet to be found.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La investigación sobre el Crisol lo ha identificado como un dispositivo para la terraformación de la superficie. Alimentado por la energía geotérmica del planeta, podría convertir un páramo en un floreciente jardín. Sin embargo, aún no se ha encontrado la forma de lanzarlo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}坩堝を調査した結果、地表をテラフォーミングする装置であることが判明した。惑星の地熱エネルギーを燃料として用い、荒地を花満開の庭園に変えることができるかもしれない。しかし、その装置の起動方法はまだ判明していない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Research into the Crucible has identified it as a device for surface terraforming. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it has yet to be found.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}坩堝を調査した結果、地表をテラフォーミングする装置であることが判明した。惑星の地熱エネルギーを燃料として用い、荒地を花満開の庭園に変えることができるかもしれない。しかし、その装置の起動方法はまだ判明していない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les recherches menées sur le Creuset déterminent qu'il s'agit d'un mécanisme de terraformation. Alimenté par l'énergie géothermique de la planète, il est capable de changer un vaste terrain vague en jardin fleuri. Toutefois, nul n'a encore découvert comment l'activer à ce jour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Research into the Crucible has identified it as a device for surface terraforming. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it has yet to be found.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les recherches menées sur le Creuset déterminent qu'il s'agit d'un mécanisme de terraformation. Alimenté par l'énergie géothermique de la planète, il est capable de changer un vaste terrain vague en jardin fleuri. Toutefois, nul n'a encore découvert comment l'activer à ce jour.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Erforschung des Tiegels hat ihn als Gerät für das Terraforming von Planetenoberflächen identifiziert. Angetrieben von der geothermalen Energie des Planeten konnte er eine Einöde in einen blühenden Garten verwandeln. Es wurde jedoch noch keine Möglichkeit gefunden, ihn in Gang zu setzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Research into the Crucible has identified it as a device for surface terraforming. Fuelled by the geothermal energy of the planet, it could turn a wasteland into a blooming garden. However, a way to launch it has yet to be found.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Erforschung des Tiegels hat ihn als Gerät für das Terraforming von Planetenoberflächen identifiziert. Angetrieben von der geothermalen Energie des Planeten konnte er eine Einöde in einen blühenden Garten verwandeln. Es wurde jedoch noch keine Möglichkeit gefunden, ihn in Gang zu setzen.{/n}
